Verses: 1 melum, Nee Avargalukku Arivikka Vendiya Piramaanangalaavana:
2 ebireyaril Oru Adimaiyaik Kondaayaanaal, Avan Aaruvarusham Seviththu, Ezhaam Varushaththile Ondrum Kodaamal Vidudhalaipetrup Pogakkadavan.
3 ondrikkaaranaai Vandhirundhaanaanaal, Ondrikkaaranaaip Pogakkadavan; Vivaagampanninavanaai Vandhirundhaanaanaal, Avan Penjaadhi Avanodekoodap Pogakkadaval.

4 avan Ejamaan Avanukku Oru Pennai Vivaagamjeydhu Koduththum, Aval Avanukku Aanpillaigalaiyaavadhu Penpillaigalaiyaavadhu Petrum Irundhaal, Andhap Pennum Aval Pillaigalum Aval Ejamaanaich Serakkadavargal; Avan Maaththiram Ondriyaaip Pogakkadavan.
5 andha Velaikkaaran: En Ejamaanaiyum En Penjaadhiyaiyum En Pillaikalaiyum Nesikkiren; Naan Vitudhalai Petruppoka Manadhillai Endru Manappoorvamaaich Cholvaanaanaal,

6 avan Ejamaan Avanai Niyaayaadhibadhigalidaththil Azhaiththukkondupoi, Avanaik Kadhavin Arugeyaavadhu Kadhavunilaiyin Arugeyaavadhu Serappanni, Ange Avan Ejamaan Avan Kaadhaik Kambiyinaale Kuththakkadavan; Pinbu Avan Endraikkum Avanidaththile Seviththukkondirukkakkadavan.
7 oruvan Than Magalai Velaikkaariyaaga Vitruppottaanaanaal, Velaikkaaran Vidudhalaipetrup Povadhupola Aval Pogak Koodaadhu.

8 avalaith Thanakku Niyamiththuk Konda Ejamaanin Paarvaikku Aval Thagaadhavalaaip Ponaal, Aval Meetkappadalaam; Avan Avalukkuth Thurogampanni, Avalai Anniyar Kaiyil Vitruppoda Avanukku Adhikaaram Illai.
9 avan Than Kumaaranukku Avalai Niyamiththirundhaanaanaal, Than Kumaaraththigalai Nadaththuvadhupola Avalaiyum Nadaththakkadavan.
10 avan Veroru Pennaik Kondaanaagil, Ivalukkuriya Annavasthira Vivaagakkadamai Aagiya Ivaigalil Kuraivuseyyaamal Iruppaanaaga.
11 immoondrum Avan Avalukkuch Seyyaamalponaal, Aval Panangodaamal Vidudhalaipetrup Pogakkadaval.
12 oru Manidhanaich Saagumbadi Adiththavan, Nichchayamaaik Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan.
13 oruvan Padhivirundhu Kollaamal, Dhevaseyalaaith Than Kaikku Nerittavanaik Kondraal, Avan Odippoich Seravendiya Sthalaththai Unakku Niyamippen.
14 oruvan Piranukku Virodhamaagach Sadhimosamjeydhu, Avanaith Thunigaramaaik Kondrupottaal, Avanai En Balibeedaththilirundhum Pidiththukkondu Poik Kolaiseyyavendum.
15 than Thagappanaiyaavadhu Than Thaayaiyaavadhu Adikkiravan Nichchayamaaik Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan.
16 oruvan Oru Manidhanaith Thirudi Vitruppottaalum, Ivan Avan Vasaththilirukkak Kandupidikkappattaalum Avan Nichchayamaaik Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan.
17 than Thagappanaiyaavadhu Than Thaayaiyaavadhu Sabikkiravan Nichchayamaaik Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan.
18 manidhar Sandaipanni, Oruvan Matroruvanaik Kallaal Erindhadhinaalaavadhu Kaiyaal Adiththadhinaalaavadhu Avan Saavaamal Kattilkidaiyaaik Kidandhu,

19 thirumba Ezhundhirundhu Veliyile Than Oondrukolaip Pidiththukkondu Nadamaatinaal, Adiththavan Aakkinaikku Neengalaayiruppaan; Aanaalum, Avanukku Velai Minakketta Nashtaththaik Koduththu, Avanai Nandraaik Gunamaakkuvikkakkadavan.
20 oruvan Thanakku Adimaiyaanavanaiyaavadhu Thanakku Adimaiyaanavalaiyaavadhu, Kolaal Adiththadhinaale, Avan Kaiyaal Irandhuponaal, Pazhikkuppazhi Vaangappadavendum.
21 oru Naalaavadhu Irandu Naalaavadhu Uyirodirundhaal, Avargal Avanudaiya Udaimaiyaagaiyaal, Pazhivaangavendiyadhillai.

22 manidhar Sandaipanni, Karppavadhiyaana Oru Sthireeyai Adiththadhinaal, Avalukku Vere Sedhamillaamal Karppam Vizhundhuponaal Adipatta Sthireeyin Purushan Adiththavanmel Sumaththugiradharkuththakkadhaayum Niyaayaadhibadhigal Seyyum Theerppinbadiyum Thandam Kodukkavendum.
23 vere Sedhamundaanaal, Jeevanukku Jeevan,
24 kannukkuk Kan, Pallukkup Pal, Kaikkuk Kai, Kaalukkuk Kaal,
25 soottukkuch Soodu, Kaayaththukkuk Kaayam, Thazhumbukkuth Thazhumbu Pazhi Kodukkavendum.
26 oruvan Than Adimaiyaanavan Kannaiyaagilum Than Adimaippennin Kannaiyaagilum Adiththadhinaal Adhaik Keduththaal Avan Kannukkup Padhilaaga Avanai Vidudhalaipannividavendum.
27 avan Than Adimaiyaanavan Pallaiyaavadhu Than Adimaippennin Pallaiyaavadhu Udhira Adiththaal, Avan Pallukkuppadhilaaga Avanai Vidudhalaipannividavendum.

28 oru Maadu Oru Purushanaiyaavadhu Oru Sthireeyaiyaavadhu Muttinadhinaal Saavundaanaal, Andha Maadu Kalleriyappadavendum, Adhin Maamsam Pusikkappadalaagaadhu; Appozhudhu Maattin Ejamaan Aakkinaikku Neengalaayiruppaan.

29 than Maadu Vazhakkamaai Muttugira Maadaayirundhu, Adhu Adhin Ejamaanukku Arivikkappattum, Avan Adhaik Kattivaikkaadhadhinaal, Adhu Oru Purushanaiyaavadhu Oru Sthireeyaiyaavadhu Kondrupottaal, Maadum Kalleriyappadavendum, Adhin Ejamaanum Kolaiseyyappadavendum.
30 aparaadham Kodukkumbadi Theerkkappattadhaanaal, Avan Than Jeevanai Meetkum Porulaaga Vidhikkappatta Aparaadhadhkaik Kodukkakkadavan.
31 adhu Oruvan Maganai Muttinaalum Sari, Oruvan Magalai Muttinaalum Sari, Indhath Theerppinbadiye Avanukkuch Seyyappadavendum.

32 andha Maadu Oru Adimaiyaanavanaiyaavadhu Oru Adimaippennaiyaavadhu Muttinaal, Adharku Udaiyavan Avargaludaiya Ejamaanukku Muppadhu Sekkal Niraiyaana Velliyaik Kodukkakkadavan; Maadu Kalleriyappadavendum.
33 oruvan Oru Kuzhiyaith Thirandhu Vaiththadhinaalaavadhu, Oru Kuzhiyai Vetti Adhai Moodaadheponadhinaalaavadhu, Adhile Oru Maadaavadhu Oru Kazhudhaiyaavadhu Vizhundhaal,
34 kuzhikku Udaiyavan Adharku Eedaagap Panaththai Mirugaththin Ejamaanukkuk Kodukkakkadavan; Seththadho Avanudaiyadhaagavendum.
35 oruvanudaiya Maadu Matravanudaiya Maattai Muttinadhinaal Adhu Seththaal, Uyirodirukkira Maattai Avargal Vitru, Adhin Kirayaththaip Pangittu, Seththadhaiyum Pangittukkollakkadavargal.
36 andha Maadu Munname Muttugira Maadendru Adhin Ejamaan Arindhirundhum, Adhaik Kattivaikkaadhirundhaal, Avan Maattukku Maattaik Kodukkakkadavan; Seththadho Avanudaiyadhaagavendum.
